Interface Stream

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, Flushable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Stream.Binary, Stream.Char
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppendableStream, BinaryOutputStream

    public interface Stream
extends Flushable, Closeable
    Author:
    Julien Viet
